text: Guy of Dampierre (c. 1226 – 7 March 1305, Compiègne) was the Count of Flanders (1251–1305) and Marquis of Namur (1264–1305). He was a prisoner of the French when his Flemings defeated the latter at the Battle of the Golden Spurs in 1302. Category:1220s births Category:1305 deaths Category:Counts of Namur
title: Guy, Count of Flanders
